name: Ditto
author: Misa Tsutsui
flavor_text: It can reconstitute its entire cellular structure to change into what it sees, but it returns to normal when it relaxes.

abilities.name: Sudden Transformation
abilities.effect: This Pokémon can use the attacks of any Basic Pokémon in your discard pile, except for Pokémon with a Rule Box (Pokémon V, Pokémon-GX, etc. have Rule Boxes). (You still need the necessary Energy to use each attack.)
